message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $18,000 might have been a tad high, but $10,000 undervalues the product's true worth. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
